p: The culture media used were Brain Heart Infusion (BHI), Sabouraud Dextrose Agar purchased from Difco Laboratories Ltd, United States, France, RPMI 1640 with L-glutamine, and bicarbonate (Difco Laboratories Ltd, United States, France, and INLAB, San Paulo, Brazil). All media were prepared as per the manufacturerâ€™s descriptions.
